description: 1. Refers to a raw meat or fishy smell (rank odor). 2. Used as internet slang or colloquialism to mean flamboyant, flashy, coquettish, or sometimes 'loose' (similar to 'ni hao sao a').

examples.chinese: 大街上有很多银杏树,臭白果味儿还有骚气
examples.translation: There are many ginkgo trees on the street; the rotting fruit smells rank.
Running this suit color is very flamboyant.

examples.chinese: 你这操作也太骚气了吧
examples.translation: Your way of doing things is too flashy/unconventional.
